bibl.title: Cartonnage Papyri in Context. New Ptolemaic Documents from Abu Sir al-Malaq. (Commentationes Humanarum Litterarum. 119, 2002.)
bibl.note: P. Berlin Salmenkivi 1-20. - 1. Cartonnage Papyri in Context: Introduction. - 2. Unpublished Greek Documents from Cartonnage BL 383.1. [The same cartonnage has yielded the texts published in B.G.U. XVIII, 1, and consequently, the texts edited here will appear in the B.G.U.-series together with further documents.] - 3. Epilogue. - Concordance. Appendix. Indices. Bibliography.
